data.name: Mexican provenza 's phone number validator
data.description:
Validate all numbers to make local calls from the provenza at the Mexican United States.

The first two digits of the phone numbers when dialed locally are known as `lada`.
To make phone numbers more readable some people write the `lada` between parenthesis. As you will see in further Katas `lada` concept is actually deeper than area code.

Example
---


____
Valid numbers:

* (98) 9 65 21
* (98) 9 6521
* (98) 96521
* (98)96521
* 59 5 65 87
* 59 5 6587
* 59 56587
* 5956587

Non-Valid numbers:

* 9 9956485
* abcdefgh
* (9 8)96521
* (98) 9 6 521

As you have observed  **numbers can be any digit (not starting with 59 or 98 only)**

This is the first Kata of a series

1. [Mexican provenza's phone number validator](https://www.codewars.com/kata/577bfdc0d48e5172ed00021d)
2. [Mexican capital's phone number validator](https://www.codewars.com/kata/577c136fdf78c163990007cd/)
